languages.text: "Я тоже это чувствую! Обычно машины источают едва различимые цвета... Прямо как ваше тело, магос. Но в этом месте... все оттенки смешались в грязь".
"I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."
languages.original_text: "Я тоже это чувствую! Обычно машины источают едва различимые цвета... Прямо как ваше тело, магос. Но в этом месте... все оттенки смешались в грязь".

traits.locale_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."
"I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."
"I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."
"I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

languages.text: “我也同样能感觉得到！机器通常只会呈现出几乎无法辨认的颜色……就像你的身体一样，贤者。可在这里……所有的一切都呈现着烂泥的颜色。”
languages.original_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

traits.locale_text: “我也同样能感觉得到！机器通常只会呈现出几乎无法辨认的颜色……就像你的身体一样，贤者。可在这里……所有的一切都呈现着烂泥的颜色。”

languages.text: «¡Yo también lo siento! Normalmente, las máquinas apenas generan colores discernibles... al igual que su cuerpo, magos. Pero aquí... todos los tonos se han combinado en fango».
languages.original_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

traits.locale_text: «¡Yo también lo siento! Normalmente, las máquinas apenas generan colores discernibles... al igual que su cuerpo, magos. Pero aquí... todos los tonos se han combinado en fango».

languages.text: 「私にもそれを感じられるわ！機械は普段、ほぼ識別のできない色を見せる…あなたの身体のように。でもここでは…すべての色彩が、泥のように混ざり合っているわ」
languages.original_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

traits.locale_text: 「私にもそれを感じられるわ！機械は普段、ほぼ識別のできない色を見せる…あなたの身体のように。でもここでは…すべての色彩が、泥のように混ざり合っているわ」

languages.text: "Ich kann es auch spüren! Maschinen geben für gewöhnlich kaum wahrnehmbare Farben ab ... genau wie Euer Körper, Magos. Aber hier ... all die Farbtöne sind zu Schmutz verschmolzen."
languages.original_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es auch spüren! Maschinen geben für gewöhnlich kaum wahrnehmbare Farben ab ... genau wie Euer Körper, Magos. Aber hier ... all die Farbtöne sind zu Schmutz verschmolzen."

languages.text: « Oui, moi aussi je peux le sentir ! D'ordinaire, les couleurs des machines sont à peine discernables... un peu comme celles de votre propre corps, magos. Mais là... toutes les nuances se sont fondues pour former une espèce de gadoue. »
languages.original_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, moi aussi je peux le sentir ! D'ordinaire, les couleurs des machines sont à peine discernables... un peu comme celles de votre propre corps, magos. Mais là... toutes les nuances se sont fondues pour former une espèce de gadoue. »

languages.text: "Ben de hissedebiliyorum! Makinelerin birbirinden ayrışan renkler gösterdikleri çok nadirdir. Tıpkı senin bedenin gibi Magos ama burada... Bütün tonlar çamurla bir olmuş gibi."
languages.original_text: "I can sense it too! Machines usually give off barely discernible colours... exactly like your body, Magos. But here... all the hues have blended into muck."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de hissedebiliyorum! Makinelerin birbirinden ayrışan renkler gösterdikleri çok nadirdir. Tıpkı senin bedenin gibi Magos ama burada... Bütün tonlar çamurla bir olmuş gibi."
